mapper.insert: insert into decoration (id, company, address, tele, img, itemfrom, info, style, link) VALUES (#{id}, #{company}, #{address}, #{tele}, #{img}, #{itemfrom}, #{info}, #{style}, #{link})
mapper.select: select ID, company, address, tele, img, itemFrom, info, style, link from decoration where company = #{company}
select ID, company, address, tele, img, itemFrom, info, style, link from decoration where company like '${keywords}';
select ID, company, address, tele, img, itemFrom, info, style, link from decoration
select ID, company, address, tele, img, itemFrom, info, style, link from decoration where decoration.style = #{style}
select ID, company, address, tele, img, itemFrom, info, style, link from decoration where decoration.address = #{address}
